quote: Living in a monastery, even as a guest rather than a monk, you have more opportunities than you might have elsewhere to see the world as it is, instead of through the shadow that you cast upon it.
quote_letters: LIVING IN A MONASTERY EVEN AS A GUEST RATHER THAN A MONK YOU HAVE MORE OPPORTUNITIES THAN YOU MIGHT HAVE ELSEWHERE TO SEE THE WORLD AS IT IS INSTEAD OF THROUGH THE SHADOW THAT YOU CAST UPON IT
